items.title: Ram ends EV pickup truck plans
items.summary: Stellantis, the parent company of Ram, said Friday that it will no longer develop a battery-electric full-size pickup. The company cited low demand for full-size battery-electric trucks as the primary reason.

items.title: Three die in Ukraine's Sumy region, Zelenskiy says Russian offensive there has failed
items.summary: (Reuters) -An early morning Russian attack killed three people on Friday in northern Ukraine's Sumy region, a regional official reported, but President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said Moscow's attempts to advance in the area had failed with heavy losses. Read full story

items.title: Pre-order deals: AirPods Pro 3 and Apple Watch Series 11/Ultra 3 now live [Update #3]
items.summary:
Apple has now officially unleashed its next-generation iPhone 17 lineup, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch SE3, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the new AirPods Pro 3. All of this joins a host of new accessories and is now up for pre-order (iPhone 17 pre-sales go live on Friday though). While you can of course pre-order all of the new gear straight from Apple, it is also all now live on Amazon, and if you have some FREE store credit on your account from all of the promotional offers we have featured over the last several months – there were hundreds in Amazon credit promotions live for Prime Day this year – you can now leverage it on the new Apple gear.

items.title: Nintendo announces Super Mario Galaxy + Galaxy 2 bundle: Runs in 4K on Switch 2, new content, more
items.summary:
Update: Pre-orders on physical copies of the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle are now live at Walmart and Target. 

Tomorrow is the 40th anniversary for Super Mario Bros. and Nintendo is ready to celebrate. During today’s Direct presentation it debuted a ton of exciting updates and new releases for Mario’s 40th, including a new teaser trailer and confirmation of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. However, on top of that we are also getting a new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle release as well as two new companion amiibo figures too.

items.title: G7 finance ministers discuss possible sanctions, tariffs on supporters of Russia's war
items.summary: OTTAWA (Reuters) -The Group of Seven nations' finance ministers, in a meeting on Friday, discussed possibly imposing sanctions and trade measures such as tariffs on countries that they consider to be "enabling" Russia's war in Ukraine, according to a statement released by the Canadian finance ministry. During today’s lengthy Nintendo Direct, we did not get any updates on the Switch Online GameCube library, but Nintendo did officially announce Virtual Boy! It is ready to add an entirely new console to its Nintendo Classics collection in the form of the ultra-retro Virtual Boy library alongside an actual Virtual Boy peripheral you stick your Switch or Switch 2 inside of. items.title: All of the Mario 40th anniversary reveals: Mario Galaxy, Tennis Fever, new Yoshi game, and an actual Talking Flower
items.summary:
Nintendo’s big September Direct is a wrap and it certainly did not disappoint for Mario’s big 40th anniversary. The first Super Mario Bros. game released almost exactly 40 years ago and Nintendo unsheathed this year’s celebration with a host of key announcements in the form of upgraded versions of beloved Mario classics, a new Switch 2 Edition of one of the best 2D Mario games of the modern era, the official announcement of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, a new Yoshi game, the new Mario Tennis experience, and a even a talking flower.

This model usually goes for $800 at full price, but it’s been more routinely selling for $700, which we’ve mostly been seeing dropped between $550 and $600 with discounts, though there was a one-time drop to the $500 low during July’s Prime Day event, rising to $520 for a short period after. The deal here saves you $260 off the going rate, landing it down at the third-lowest price we have tracked and the best rate we’ve seen since mid-July.

If there’s an outlet in your home that you wish was somewhere else, this sort of power strip can really save the day. It features a wall cover plug that goes over top of a standard outlet to help disguise it. From there you can run the wall mountable power strip elsewhere. It offers a total of three AC outlets, two Type-C ports, and one USB-A, which is a nice upgrade from the standard outlet that you are replacing.
